boardgame.name: Norenberc
Nürnberg
Nürnberg: Die Zünfte der Stadt
boardgame.description: In Norenberc, each player represents an ambitious merchant trying to gain influence in the town council of Norenberc. To do this, players must win over the craftsmen of the city's various guilds. The player who manages to win over the most (and the most influential) craftsmen will be the one who wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Every round consists of one or more turns. Every turn, all players simultaneously select the guilds at which they wish to take actions, limited by the number of agents at their disposal. Actions include buying and selling goods and hiring guests who are lodging at the guilds: various craftsmen and townsmen with useful special abilities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of each round, the master of each guild will select a favorite from among the players: the one owning the most of that guild's goods. The favorite of each guild will claim the loyalty of that guild master and earn one of that guild's crests. The most important guild in the city will also bestow one of the valuable prestige crests upon its favorite._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of the game, players will compare their amassed craftsmen, crests, money, and townsmen to see who has won the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Heavy Cardboard Episode 1 – Madeira and Getting to Know You!
Podcast #030 - Monográfico: Ya ha llegado Essen 2010

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Selling quite cheaply as we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re just interested in freeing up some shelf space. Because the game weighs over 2kg, shipping to the UK only. Shipping is 2nd Class - £7.50. The game: White Goblin Games (c) 2010. English, French, Dutch and German rules included. All game parts are punched but still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.

International White Goblin Games edition with English, Dutch, French and German rules. Played twice. Comes with the much sought after Bonus Essen Townspeople. Direct bank transfer is the best way to pay. Check out my other games to bundle an order and save on postage.
Excellent - played once. Includes Essen Bonus Townsmen
